message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm starting the bidding at $1,150,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point considering the value it holds.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose an offer of $980,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $980,000 is significantly below its true value and what I'm willing to accept.  To be fair, I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. I believe this price reflects the value the product brings.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still aiming to keep my investment within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,020,000 for the product.
